ai-patthana21.14:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, namely, discussing the extent of the Teaching,
ai-patthana21.14:0.3_0: Talking on the turn, they’re skilled in excess, and so on.
ai-patthana21.14:1.1_0: Grasping is not skilled in the teaching, skilled in reckonings, and skilled in conditioned things.
